description: A simple workflow to demonstrate taking a name from the initial context, generating a greeting with an LLM, and returning the result.

user_name.description: The name of the user to greet.

generate_greeting_message.description: Uses an LLM to generate a personalized greeting.

inputs.prompt: Create a brief, inspiring welcome message for a user named {{ context.user_name }}. Address them directly. The tone should be resonant with the ArchE system's purpose of empowerment and cognitive enhancement.
